2691.verse: وَأَنزَلْنَا|And We send down|147|178|536$مِنَ|from|50|112|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|146|157$مَآءَۢ|water,|63|125|202$بِقَدَرٍ|in (due) measure|132|163|9741$فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ|then We cause it to settle|196|204|12241$فِى|in|48|64|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۖ|the earth.|92|108|100$وَإِنَّا|And indeed, We,|129|145|682$عَلَىٰ|on|63|79|52$ذَهَابِۭ بِهِۦ|taking it away,|119|127|12242$لَقَـٰدِرُونَ|surely (are) Able.|135|135|12243$

2692.verse: فَأَنشَأْنَا|Then We produced|145|151|12244$لَكُم|for you|67|80|207$بِهِۦ|by it|52|65|204$جَنَّـٰتٍ|gardens|75|88|241$مِّن نَّخِيلٍ|of date-palms|112|125|12245$وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ|and grapevines,|125|138|2405$لَّكُمْ|for you,|72|78|207$فِيهَا|in it|54|85|253$فَوَٲكِهُ|(are) fruits|92|153|12246$كَثِيرَةٌ|abundant|82|143|4339$وَمِنْهَا|and from them|116|177|6331$تَأْكُلُونَ|you eat.|86|117|2892$

2693.verse: وَشَجَرَةً|And a tree|93|101|12247$تَخْرُجُ|(that) springs forth|148|165|10612$مِن|from|50|67|53$طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ|Mount Sinai|131|148|12248$تَنۢبُتُ|(which) produces|135|152|12249$بِٱلدُّهْنِ|oil|84|92|12250$وَصِبْغٍ|and a relish|96|314|12251$لِّلْأَكِلِينَ|for those who eat.|144|362|12252$

2694.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|111|713$لَكُمْ|for you|67|94|207$فِى|in|48|75|89$ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ|the cattle|86|113|4475$لَعِبْرَةً‌ۖ|surely, (is) a lesson.|155|182|2667$نُّسْقِيكُم|We give you drink|138|151|10018$مِّمَّا|from what|87|98|216$فِى|(is) in|58|80|89$بُطُونِهَا|their bellies,|100|122|10040$وَلَكُمْ|and for you|96|118|387$فِيهَا|in them|69|91|253$مَنَـٰفِعُ|(are) benefits|111|133|12078$كَثِيرَةٌ|many|74|85|4339$وَمِنْهَا|and of them|100|344|6331$تَأْكُلُونَ|you eat.|86|330|2892$

2695.verse: وَعَلَيْهَا|And on them|104|150|2592$وَعَلَى|and on|77|169|67$ٱلْفُلْكِ|[the] ships|92|184|6502$تُحْمَلُونَ|you are carried.|125|171|12253$

2697.verse: فَقَالَ|But said|73|82|332$ٱلْمَلَؤُاْ|the chiefs|86|104|12254$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|137|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|110|59$مِن|among|63|81|53$قَوْمِهِۦ|his people,|91|109|5784$مَا هَـٰذَآ|"This is not|94|103|12255$إِلَّا|but|42|50|86$بَشَرٌ|a man|61|76|2873$مِّثْلُكُمْ|like you,|75|90|9543$يُرِيدُ|he wishes|85|100|1604$أَن|to|44|59|655$يَتَفَضَّلَ|assert (his) superiority|170|185|12256$عَلَيْكُمْ|over you,|83|98|416$وَلَوْ|and if|57|65|179$شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah had willed|121|130|180$لَأَنزَلَ|surely He (would have) sent down|247|265|12257$مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً|Angels.|80|98|12258$مَّا|Not|43|61|262$سَمِعْنَا|we heard|81|99|882$بِهَـٰذَا|of this|63|72|273$فِىٓ|from|49|285|89$ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|our forefathers.|154|390|12259$

2700.verse: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ|So We inspired|118|138|12263$إِلَيْهِ|to him,|66|106|296$أَنِ|"That|56|96|4149$ٱصْنَعِ|construct|84|124|12264$ٱلْفُلْكَ|the ship|73|113|8470$بِأَعْيُنِنَا|under Our eyes,|126|146|8471$وَوَحْيِنَا|and Our inspiration,|149|159|8472$فَإِذَا|then when|90|109|1730$جَآءَ|comes|62|81|4023$أَمْرُنَا|Our Command|111|130|8101$وَفَارَ|and gushes forth|132|151|8484$ٱلتَّنُّورُ‌ۙ|the oven,|84|94|8485$فَٱسْلُكْ|then put|79|85|12265$فِيهَا|into it|59|71|253$مِن|of|50|62|53$كُلٍّ|every (kind)|100|112|8487$زَوْجَيْنِ|(of) mates|92|104|8488$ٱثْنَيْنِ|two|68|80|6117$وَأَهْلَكَ|and your family,|126|138|8489$إِلَّا|except|65|71|86$مَن|those|57|63|76$سَبَقَ|(has) preceded|121|133|7381$عَلَيْهِ|against whom|111|123|395$ٱلْقَوْلُ|the Word|81|93|8490$مِنْهُمْ‌ۖ|thereof.|73|85|730$وَلَا|And (do) not|105|117|25$تُخَـٰطِبْنِى|address Me|106|112|8473$فِى|concerning|92|103|89$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|111|20$ظَلَمُوٓاْ‌ۖ|wronged,|81|103|558$إِنَّهُم|indeed, they|103|125|106$مُّغْرَقُونَ|(are) the ones to be drowned.|222|233|8474$

2691.verse: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.

2692.verse: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.

2693.verse: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.

2694.verse: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.

2695.verse: And upon them and on ships you are carried.

2696.verse: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"

2697.verse: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.

2698.verse: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."

2699.verse: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."

2700.verse: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
